name: public-transport-sentiment-lists
description: A collection of sentiment lists for different languages and contexts inspired by AFINN

scripts.test: cd node_modules/sentiment-custom-lists; npm run postinstall; cd ../..; mocha --recursive test/weights
scripts.p: git commit -am 'scored tweets'; npm version patch; git push --tags; git push
scripts.check-and-test: cd node_modules/sentiment-custom-lists; npm run postinstall; cd ../..; node test/checkScript.js; mocha --recursive test/weights

author: Oliver Lorenz <mail@oliverlorenz.com>
